dialog.text: Top half is cloud, bot half is sea. at the middle of the sea, there is a rock
what size is the rock?
one tenth of the picture size tall, and one fifth of the picture size wide
does the rock protrude into the sky?
No, is in the middle of the sea section, not the middle of the picture
are there any other characteristics of the rock? what kind of clouds are in the sky?
the cloud in the sky is dense. There is just a rock. But at the center of the picture, there is a very small mountain, very small
is the mountain behind the sea? is it cloud or fog in the sky? does it fill up the whole sky?
just plain cloud. the mountain just at the middle of the picture. There will be some grass at the left bottom corner
is the grass part of a beach?
no, just grass as the corner
how big is the corner of grass?
The one you having right now is good for grass, but smaller the rock . the clouds needs way thicker than the one you have right now
like one big cloud in the middle of the sky?
is a big cloud, but through out the sky, not just the center
anything else?
the sea, should be half of the picture, half sea half clouds
is the mountain in the middle connected to anything?
mountain is at the correct position
so i'm done?
